BIBREF2.title: EMRinger: side chain-directed model and map validation for 3D cryoelectron microscopy

BIBREF4.title: Structure of SARS coronavirus spike receptor-binding domain complexed with receptor

TABREF3.text: Electron microscopy data and refinement statistics, continued. All image movies were collected at a nominal magnification of 29,000, resulting in an image pixel size of 1.03 Å on a Titan Krios operating at 300 keV with a total 65 e -/Å 2 using 250 ms/frame. Final resolution was determined at a Fourier shell correlation of 0.143 between independently refined half maps.
